Detailed Description

Abstract class of Gaussian Approximation filters.

For discrete-discrete models (Gaussian_Nonlinear_Model), these filters approximate the probability density of the state transition and the probability of the observation by gaussian densities. The approximation is exact in the case of linear model (Gaussian_Linear_Model) and lead to the discrete-discrete Kalman Filter (DD_Kalman). For other non-linear models (Gaussian_Nonlinear_Model) UKF (Unscented_Kalman_Filter) or EKF (Extended_Kalman_Filter) can be used.
